product_title: Tiered Smocked Waist Jersey Maxi Dress
product_description: For flowy movement and effortless, comfortable style, this maxi dress cut from soft slubbed jersey features loose, airy armholes and an offset-tiered skirt.
product_details_and_care:
For flowy movement and effortless, comfortable style, this maxi dress cut from soft slubbed jersey features loose, airy armholes and an offset-tiered skirt. Shirring defines the waist while adding more rippling motion to the easy-breezy look.
47" front length; 51" back length (size Medium)
Slips on over head
Scoop neck
Sleeveless
Unlined
60% cotton, 40% modal
Machine wash, dry flat
Imported
Item #5999457
product_size_info:
Runs large; order one size down.
XXS=00, XS=0-2, S=4-6, M=8-10, L=12-14, XL=16 (14W), XXL=18 (16W).
